basics.name: Dean Hattenhauer
basics.label: Software QA Tester & Analyst
basics.summary:
Detail-oriented Software QA Tester with hands-on experience in manual, API, performance, and automation testing, backed by a strong foundation in process improvement and quality leadership. Adept at creating and executing test cases, identifying and documenting defects, and applying Agile methodologies to ensure software reliability and performance. Combines analytical, process-driven thinking and a Lean Six Sigma foundation with practical skills in tools like Jira, Zephyr, Postman, JMeter, and Selenium. 

 Currently pursuing industry certifications, including ISTQB CTFL, with a long-term focus on advancing into Game QA and Game Development—bridging quality assurance and creative design.

work.name: Foundation Risk Partners
work.summary: Data analysis and automation across insurance operations.
highlights: Partner with cross-functional stakeholders to coordinate, plan, and deliver process improvement initiatives supporting compliance, audit readiness, and operational efficiency in an insurance and risk management environment.
Conduct root cause analysis on process gaps and compliance failures; implement standardized corrective workflows, reducing repeat audit issues by 35%.

Develop and maintain Power BI dashboards and Excel reports to track KPIs for audit performance, SLA adherence, and process compliance — enabling leadership to identify bottlenecks and prioritize solutions.
Lead change management for audit workflow updates by creating documentation, training materials, and adoption strategies across multiple departments.
Automate repetitive audit tasks using PowerShell scripts (data cleanup, report archiving, SLA alerts), cutting manual workload by 60% and improving consistency.

work.name: Foundever
work.summary: Rejoined after a 1-year external Project Coordinator role (Apr 2021 – Apr 2022); returned to core QA leadership responsibilities with an expanded scope in performance oversight, automation, data-driven reporting, and cross-site continuous improvement.
highlights: Spearheaded continuous improvement projects across four operational sites, boosting evaluation efficiency by 15% through automation of call grading processes.
Facilitated RCPS (Root Cause Problem Solving) workshops, reducing defects by 50% and improving Six Sigma performance from 3.09 to 3.58.
Designed and implemented a centralized quality reporting system to monitor quality metrics, enabling rapid insights and more targeted coaching strategies.
Standardized claims QA documentation and escalation protocols, reducing onboarding time and ensuring consistency across teams.

work.name: Foundever
work.summary: Led QA initiatives and reporting automation across financial operations.
highlights: Facilitated weekly, bi-weekly, and monthly business reviews with senior bank stakeholders, presenting KPI trends, audit outcomes, and performance improvement plans to drive alignment and accountability.
Developed executive-ready KPI dashboards and performance reports, ensuring clear visibility into dispute resolution accuracy, SLA adherence, and compliance results across multiple sites.
Partnered with directors and VPs to create corrective action plans for underperforming metrics, resulting in measurable improvements in accuracy, timeliness, and customer experience.
Influenced strategic decision-making by translating quality data into actionable insights, positioning QA as a driver of operational and financial performance.

certificates.name: Build an AI Agent in Python

projects.name: Manual Web Testing
projects.description:
Executed 75+ manual test cases across travel booking, to-do, and e-commerce web apps; identified 10+ defects through Jira/Zephyr, Trello, and Qase. 
 Applied black-box and boundary-value techniques, ensuring functional coverage and user-journey validation.
highlights: Jira, Zephyr, Trello, Qase, Agile QA

projects.name: API Testing with Postman
projects.description:
Built 30+ Postman tests validating CRUD and authentication endpoints. 
 Used JavaScript assertions and dynamic environment variables to chain requests, verify response codes, payloads, and performance thresholds.
highlights: Postman, REST API, JavaScript Assertions, Auth Tokens

projects.name: Performance Testing with JMeter
projects.description:
Configured Thread Groups, Controllers, and Listeners to simulate user load and analyze response time and throughput. 
 Applied performance metrics (utilization, robustness, scalability) to identify bottlenecks under varying test conditions.
highlights: JMeter, BlazeMeter, Performance Testing

projects.name: UI Automation with Selenium & Katalon
projects.description:
Created automated UI test scripts in Python using Selenium WebDriver to validate form and navigation flows. 
 Explored Katalon Studio for codeless test automation and reporting dashboards.
highlights: Selenium, Python, Katalon, Automation Frameworks

projects.name: Audit Workflow Automation (Foundation Risk Partners)
projects.description:
Automated internal audit workflows with PowerShell for attachments, archiving, and SLA alerts, cutting manual workload by 60%. 
 Improved audit turnaround time and consistency in compliance reporting.
highlights: PowerShell, Excel, Process Automation

projects.name: Power BI Audit Tracker Dashboard (Foundation Risk Partners)
projects.description:
Built an interactive dashboard to track audit progress, SLA compliance, and department KPIs. 
 Enabled leadership to detect bottlenecks in real time and increased SLA-aligned completion by 15%.
highlights: Power BI, DAX, Excel, Data Visualization

projects.name: AI Agent in Python (Boot.dev Project)
projects.description:
Developed an LLM-powered agent using Google Gemini API capable of reading, updating, and executing code via autonomous feedback loops. 
 Demonstrated early AI-driven test automation capabilities.
highlights: Python, Google Gemini API, Agentic Workflows

projects.name: Movie Information Finder (Front-End API Project)
projects.description:
Created a JavaScript web app integrating TMDb API for search, movie details, and random recommendations. 
 Designed with modular code and responsive UI for clear data presentation.
highlights: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TMDb API

projects.name: Weather App (Front-End API Project)
projects.description:
Built a front-end weather application allowing users to check real-time forecasts by city and state. 
 Implemented dynamic data retrieval using the OpenWeatherMap API and styled responsive layouts for mobile and desktop users.
highlights: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, OpenWeatherMap API

projects.name: JavaScript Evaluation Automation Project (Foundever)
projects.description:
Developed a browser-based JavaScript automation script to evaluate and validate functions for syntax correctness, edge-case handling, and runtime performance. 
 Leveraged DOM manipulation to dynamically parse input elements, trigger test cases, and display validation results, reducing manual review time and improving testing accuracy.
highlights: JavaScript, DOM Manipulation, Automation, Unit Testing

projects.name: Full Security Audit Process Revamp (Foundation Risk Partners)
projects.description:
Standardized and documented workflows for 18+ recurring security audits, improving consistency and onboarding efficiency. 
 Reduced missed steps and enhanced audit traceability through detailed process mapping and cross-department visibility.
highlights: Process Documentation, Power BI, PowerShell, Excel

projects.name: RCPS Defect Reduction Initiative (Foundever)
projects.description:
Led Root Cause Problem Solving workshops targeting systemic QA performance issues. 
 Reduced recurring defects by 50% and improved Six Sigma performance from 3.09 to 3.58 across multiple sites.
highlights: RCA Frameworks, Six Sigma DMAIC, Process Improvement

projects.name: Gender Reveal Website (Early Project)
projects.description:
Created a fun interactive site within the first week of learning web development. 
 A nostalgic milestone demonstrating early creativity and curiosity in design and interaction logic.
highlights: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
